devices.name: h1
cmds: tshark -i eth0 -w h1_tcpreplay_elephant_mice.pcapng -f "ip and udp and portrange 50000-60000 and not icmp" -a duration:55 &

devices.name: h2
cmds: tshark -i eth0 -w h2_tcpreplay_elephant_mice.pcapng -f "ip and udp and portrange 50000-60000 and not icmp" -a duration:55 &

devices.name: h3
cmds: tshark -i eth0 -w h3_tcpreplay_elephant_mice.pcapng -f "ip and udp and portrange 50000-60000 and not icmp" -a duration:55 &
